chapter.text: mata heian'na kono machi ni oite (chikau)
Hontoni ware wa, ningen o mottomo utsukushi sugata ni tsukutta
Sorekara ware wa, kare o mottomo hikuku sageta
Shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra ni taishite wa hateshinai hosho ga arou
Naze sore demo, omae wa shukyo (shinjitsu) o hitei suru no ka
Arra wa, mottomo sugureta shinpan-shade wanai ka
